entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
